titleStmt.title: A philosophical discourse of earth relating to the culture and improvement of it for vegetation, and the propagation of plants, &c. as it was presented to the Royal Society, April 29, 1675.
titleStmt.author: Evelyn, John, 1620-1706.

notesStmt.note: Published later in the third ed. of the author's Sylva, with title: Terra, a philosophical essay of earth. 1679.
Reproduction of original in Yale University Library.
